channel.description: Recent content in wikipedia on Martin's #rstats blog

item.title: WW2 fighter pilots - scraping html tables
item.description: This post covers how to scrape a wikipedia table and store it in an R data frame. Below is an example setup code chunk. library(knitr) if (!("devtools" %in% installed.packages())) { install.packages("devtools") } # images folder if (!file.exists("images")) { dir.create("images") } # data folder if (!file.exists("data")) { dir.create("data") } opts_chunk$set( echo = FALSE, tidy = FALSE, size = "small", fig.path = "images" ) options(tibble.width = 78) The data I want to download a table of World War II flying aces from Wikipedia.
